comments:
Build: I-20030925

existing ones, I got many instances of the following decoration error:

Error Sep 25, 2003 12:16:16.456 Errors occured while applying CVS decorations 
to resources.
org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ResourceException:

Tod, Don't know if this is us or CVS.  Figured we'd keep it close to home to 
start with.
This is a problem with the CVS decorator itself.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 43592 ***
